[[Jakō Ryūdōin]] summons a tiger made of flames from the scroll on his back, inflicting massive damage to the player's team, additionally having the ability to attach to the opponent and explode with much impact. This technique is similar to [[Fire Release: Great Dragon Fire Technique]] and [[Exploding Dragon Strike]], except that it uses a tiger rather than a dragon. It is also somewhat similar to a [[explosive tag]], but far stronger.

[[es:Elemento Fuego: Explosión Felina de Fuego]]
[[pl:Katon: Enko Bakusatsu]]
